description.tickets: This option allows you to purchase tickets.
description.passes: This option allows you to purchase passes.
description.helpRechargeablePass: Are you an occasional traveler but you don't know whats best for your wallet, buying a rechargable ticket or a monthly pass? Click here to get help finding the cheapest option.

description.monthlyNormal: This pass allows you to travel as much as you want during a whole month, in a selected zone.
description.monthlyStudent: This pass allows you to travel like the previous one but is cheaper and only available for students.
description.renew: Click here if you want to renew your pass.

description.single: This ticket allows you to do a one time trip betwen two selected bus stops.
description.rechargeable: This ticket works as a single ticket but you will have the option to recharge it with multiple single trips.
description.fullDay: This ticket allows you to travel as much as you want inside a selected area for an intire day (or multiple days if selected).
description.recharge: Click here if you want to recharge your rechargeable ticket.
